LOL!!!

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Frank Ratka 
  To: EVP-ITC@=
yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, June 08, 2009 10:02 AM
  Subject: Re: [EVP=
-ITC] Someone Ask,





        I know! I was like....huh? What are you tal=
king about? Before she could be straightened out, she quit. Now all she has=
 is Bruce and Steve to educate her about ITC....chilling thought!

        =
Regards,

        Frank R.

        --- On Mon, 6/8/09, April Abercrombie <=
april@...> wrote:


          From: April Abercrom=
bie <april@...>
          Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] S=
omeone Ask,
          To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
          Date: Monday, J=
une 8, 2009, 10:55 AM


          OMG Your kidding???

          Some peopl=
e. She seemed to have in her mind that we were discovering new frontiers in=
 spirit communication and deliberately leaving her out.

            ----- =
Original Message ----- 
            From: Frank Ratka 
            To: EVP-=
ITC@yahoogroups .com 
            Sent: Monday, June 08, 2009 9:38 AM
     =
       Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Someone Ask,


                  I never saw =
and article either and I went back through the posts. She posted to 3 group=
s at once so it my have been one and not the other two. Either way, somehow=
 she woke on the wrong side of the bed. She unsubscribed!

                =
  Regards,

                  Frank R.

                  --- On Mon, 6/8/0=
9, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh ostresearch. com> wrote:


      =
              From: April Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh ostresearch. com=
>
                    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Someone Ask,
                 =
   To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
                    Date: Monday, June 8, 2=
009, 10:35 AM


                    There are alot of rumors circulating ar=
ound. Another source claims to have pictures of him with his arms tied abov=
e his head. If this is the case, there had to have been someone else presen=
t at the time.

                    I admit, I didn't even see you post any=
 article so somehow I missed it.

                    ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
                      From: SnowfireL@aol. com 
                  =
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
                      Sent: Monday, June =
08, 2009 8:07 AM
                      Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Someone Ask,
=


                      Ron, I already sent through the article which said,=
 his hands "were tied behind his back" everyone was too busy looking at the=
 blood he had been hanging a long time, all the blood was in his legs, and =
his upper torso was white, is what one article said, some camera guy was th=
ere on the seen his name was Russell, and he claimed to have seen this type=
 of thing before, I thought Steve or someone would put 2 and 2 together.  G=
uess not, I guess no one bothered to read what I sent out there. sf






 =
                     In a message dated 6/8/2009 9:58:47 A.M. Eastern Dayli=
ght Time, warrior18eii@ yahoo.com writes:



                              =
His hands weren't tied. All the articles I have seen only state his neck wa=
s tied to his genitals. All I can say is good luck to him now!

           =
                   Regards,

                              Frank R.

      =
                        --- On Fri, 6/5/09, SnowfireL@aol. com <SnowfireL@a=
ol. com> wrote:


                                From: SnowfireL@aol. com =
<SnowfireL@aol. com>
                                Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC]=
 Someone Ask,
                                To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
=
                                Date: Friday, June 5, 2009, 5:59 PM


     =
                           Why was he found with his hands tied behind his =
back, and the noose around his neck and private parts, how was that an acci=
dent?

                                In a message dated 6/5/2009 6:55:51 =
P.M. Eastern Daylight Time, april@abercrombiegh ostresearch. com writes:


=

                                It wasn't suicide, it was accidental:
    =
                            Carradine Death Was Accidental

               =
                 IMDb, June 4, 2009

                                David =
Carradine died during a sex game that went wrong, according to sources in B=
angkok, Thailand, where he was found dead on Thursday.

                   =
             Carradine's body was discovered in a hotel suite and local rep=
orts suggested he committed suicide. 

                                He w=
as discovered by a maid, naked and hanged, but the suggestions his death ha=
d a sexual twist were strongly disputed by the star's close friend, attorne=
y Vicki Roberts, and his manager Chuck Binder, who insisted he died of natu=
ral causes. 

                                But a statement from Carradin=
e's representative now indicates the actor died during a sex act.

        =
                        The spokesperson tells TMZ.com, "We can confirm 100=
 percent that he never would have committed suicide. It was an accidental d=
eath. Everybody is in shock." 

                                Rumours Car=
radine died attempting auto-erotic asphyxiation- -where victims achieve hei=
ghtened sexual pleasure by restricting their air supply are backed up by a =
quote a Bangkok police officer gave to British newspaper The Sun. 

       =
                         The cop tells reporters, "A rope was attached to h=
is neck and also to his penis". 

                                Rocker Mi=
chael Hutchence was rumoured to have died attempting the same sex act in a =
Sydney, Australia, hotel room back in 1997--although his death was official=
ly declared a suicide.

                                Carradine was in Th=
ailand to shoot the movie "Stretch." He was 72.
                           =
     ----- Original Message ----- 
                                From: Sn=
owfireL@aol. com 
                                To: RTSC@yahoogroups. com=
 ; EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com ; inside_the_box_ rtsc_talk_ radio@yahoogroup s=
.com 
                                Sent: Friday, June 05, 2009 4:41 PM
 =
                               Subject: [EVP-ITC] Someone Ask,


          =
                      The spirit world to talk with David Carradine,  to se=
e what happened, if someone may have killed him, it's hard to believe that =
he would take his own life, I feel like it was foul play. sf
